scripts.deploy:force: npm run build:version && firebase deploy --only hosting --force
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:clean && npm run deploy:force
scripts.deploy:nocache: npm run build:clean && firebase deploy --only hosting --force
scripts.clean: rmdir /s /q node_modules dist build .vite .cache && del package-lock.json
scripts.clean:install: rmdir /s /q node_modules && del package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.clean:deploy: npm run clean:install && npm run build:version && npm run deploy
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build:version
scripts.serve:prod: npm run build:version && npm run serve

scripts.test:serve: npm run build:version && npm run serve
